column5: Good day everyone, Anybody to share if it is allowed to fish around lake Ontario, rivers... and to give any updates? Where do you fish now? Thank you guys
Go get your fish at the fish counter at your grocery store.
LOL, that is a nice one  Thanks
Hey Antonio, Expect more of the same. I can't answer all your questions but still legal to fish.

Pal, go out and do some exploring.  The pandemic police are in full force on websites and Facebook.  Anyone who knows isn’t going to tell because Karen will call it in.  Anyone that doesn’t will need to do their own groundwork  or have a good buddy network already in place.
The way you asked... do you have a fishing licence or are you under 18? After that, have at it on what ever land is still open to fish from. Crown land is... just can't camp there.
